channel.title: Truckdrivers on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Truckdrivers on Rusland 1

item.title: Truckdrivers – Sparks Fly
item.description: It also rhymes with жизнью пахнет земля (the earth smells of life) and так наступает весна (so spring begins). Punk rock from the Urals – with fire in the music, and in the video, besides fire, there’s also snow.
